amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that prohibits the payment of United Nations arrearages unless expressly authorized by an Act that makes such payments contingent upon United Nations reform.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 8 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the provision that prohibits the payment of United Nations arrearages unless expressly authorized by an Act that makes such payments contingent upon United Nations reform.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall (OH) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 221 (Roll no. 380).
